record1.<1>:
equ TRUE$		TO 1
EQU FALSE$		TO 0

Declare Function Send_Message, Get_Repos_Types
/* -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
@ctrlEntId->text = CreateParam<1>

appId = ""
If RepViewEdit.Check_CurrentApp->Check = TRUE$ then
	appId = @AppId<1>
end

DisplayList = RepViewEdit.Type_List->List
TypeCnt = Count(DisplayList, @FM) + (DisplayList <> "")

For i = 1 to TypeCnt
	DisplayList = Delete(DisplayList, i, 3, 0)
next i

.List_Types->List = DisplayList

If RepViewEdit.Check_CurrentApp->Check = TRUE$ then
	FilterList = Get_Repos_Types(appId)
	For i = TypeCnt to 1 step -1
		Locate DisplayList<i, 1> in FilterList using @FM setting loc then
			DisplayList = Delete(DisplayList, i, 1, 0)
		end else
			DisplayList = Delete(DisplayList, i, 0, 0)
		end
	next i
end
			
Convert @FM to @RM in DisplayList
DisplayList := @RM

vFlag = ""
Call V119("S", "", "A", "L", DisplayList, vFlag)
Convert @RM to @FM in DisplayList
DisplayList[-1, 1] = ""

.Working_List->List_Ex = DisplayList
notUsed = Send_Message("RDKV_SELUSING.WORKING_LIST", "EXPAND", 0, 1)

return TRUE$
